protocol.text: Arabidopsis plants were grown at 22 Â°C under short day conditions (8 hr light/16 hr dark)
Total RNA was isolated from seedlings using TRIzol Reagenet (Invitrogen) and further purified with RNeasy Plant mini kit columns (Qiagen) according to the protocols supplied by the manufacturers.
Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard 1 cycle Affymetrix protocol from 6 ug total RNA (Expression Analysis Technical Manua, REV3, Affymetrix).
Following fragmentation, 10 ug of cRNA were hybridized for 16 hr at 45C on GeneChip Drosophila Genome Array. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 450.
GeneChips were scanned using the GeneChip Scanner 3000 with 7G upgrade
Data was processed in the statistical programming environment R using Bioconductor packages. Raw expression values were normalized using the robust multichip averaging algorithm.
